name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】DISASTERSHOW ｜｜ Disasterpiece Release Mini Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #disastershow #calliolive [fuQ7VpAVFr4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section, Mori Calliope interacting with the audience.

subtitles.original: Heart set!
subtitles.english: Heart set!

subtitles.original: 生きるってなんだ　すっぽかした文句チックショーの物
subtitles.english: What is living? Just ditched complaints, dammit.

subtitles.original: 逃げればせっせ
subtitles.english: If you run, do it diligently.

subtitles.original: 奪い去られない　縁冷めないぜ
subtitles.english: It won't be stolen, the connection won't cool.

subtitles.original: 人生キャッキャッキャッキャッキャッキャッ
subtitles.english: Life's just laughing and having fun.

subtitles.original: 絶望もう行こうもねえ飯はファイター
subtitles.english: Despair or moving on, eat like a fighter.

subtitles.original: どんなたちにでも　凝らないんだって
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of person, I won't get stuck.

subtitles.original: 見せられた現実に囚われ
subtitles.english: Trapped in the reality I was shown.

subtitles.original: This life where we're stuck taking chances
subtitles.english: This life where we're stuck taking chances

subtitles.original: 飽き飽きしたんでしょ
subtitles.english: You're tired of it, right?

subtitles.original: We're living in a world with no direction
subtitles.english: We're living in a world with no direction

subtitles.original: Reach out with our hearts till we make a connection
subtitles.english: Reach out with our hearts till we make a connection

subtitles.original: Tearing the walls apart, facing it out side by side
subtitles.english: Tearing the walls apart, facing it out side by side

subtitles.original: Once again it's us against the world
subtitles.english: Once again it's us against the world

subtitles.original: ナンバーワンのよう　本当を見つけさせて
subtitles.english: Like being number one, let me find the truth.

subtitles.original: 本物を見せつけて
subtitles.english: Show me the real thing.

subtitles.original: ハートセット　World Unbalance
subtitles.english: Heart set, World Unbalance

subtitles.original: 踊れ
subtitles.english: Dance

subtitles.original: Adrenaline! Hey!
subtitles.english: Adrenaline! Hey!

subtitles.original: 踊れ
subtitles.english: Dance

subtitles.original: So just how far can I go?
subtitles.english: So just how far can I go?

subtitles.original: I think I already know
subtitles.english: I think I already know

subtitles.original: That view that I want to see
subtitles.english: That view that I want to see

subtitles.original: A place in history that's mine, I
subtitles.english: A place in history that's mine, I

subtitles.original: I don't know why we're always side-by-side worlds apart
subtitles.english: I don't know why we're always side-by-side worlds apart

subtitles.original: It's trial by fire, I'm fighting for a place where we can breathe
subtitles.english: It's trial by fire, I'm fighting for a place where we can breathe

subtitles.original: When spite takes over, I might just take it out on you
subtitles.english: When spite takes over, I might just take it out on you

subtitles.original: Cause you're too good to be true
subtitles.english: Cause you're too good to be true

subtitles.original: Struggling but carrying on, I'll go where nobody has gone
subtitles.english: Struggling but carrying on, I'll go where nobody has gone

subtitles.original: I'm searching again and again and again for something only I can do
subtitles.english: I'm searching again and again and again for something only I can do

subtitles.original: Asking why I can't be someone else
subtitles.english: Asking why I can't be someone else

subtitles.original: Despite it all my mind has become my hell
subtitles.english: Despite it all my mind has become my hell

subtitles.original: With no escape or hope in the dark
subtitles.english: With no escape or hope in the dark

subtitles.original: But still in my heart your words echo over and over
subtitles.english: But still in my heart your words echo over and over

subtitles.original: I'm finally letting go but I can't erase you
subtitles.english: I'm finally letting go but I can't erase you

subtitles.original: I'm following behind but I won't chase you
subtitles.english: I'm following behind but I won't chase you

subtitles.original: I'm swallowing my pride until the time that I can face you
subtitles.english: I'm swallowing my pride until the time that I can face you

subtitles.original: I thought that it was love in the perfect lighting
subtitles.english: I thought that it was love in the perfect lighting

subtitles.original: It's never been enough but I'll keep on writing a story
subtitles.english: It's never been enough but I'll keep on writing a story

subtitles.original: That's evolving from the day that I decided I'm alone
subtitles.english: That's evolving from the day that I decided I'm alone

subtitles.original: I don't belong anywhere anymore, it was my decision
subtitles.english: I don't belong anywhere anymore, it was my decision

subtitles.original: I'm gonna break down the door to your heart without your permission
subtitles.english: I'm gonna break down the door to your heart without your permission

subtitles.original: There was nothing that could make me stay
subtitles.english: There was nothing that could make me stay

subtitles.original: Remember it like it was yesterday, hanging on every word you'd say
subtitles.english: Remember it like it was yesterday, hanging on every word you'd say

subtitles.original: What if I'd walked away?
subtitles.english: What if I'd walked away?

subtitles.original: How can I still carry on, someday when you're finally gone
subtitles.english: How can I still carry on, someday when you're finally gone

subtitles.original: I'm searching again and again and again for something only I can do
subtitles.english: I'm searching again and again and again for something only I can do

subtitles.original: The truth is I can't be someone else
subtitles.english: The truth is I can't be someone else

subtitles.original: Despite it all my mind has become my hell
subtitles.english: Despite it all my mind has become my hell

subtitles.original: With no escape or hope in the dark
subtitles.english: With no escape or hope in the dark

subtitles.original: But still in my heart my words echo over and over
subtitles.english: But still in my heart my words echo over and over

subtitles.original: I'm finally letting go and you can't erase me
subtitles.english: I'm finally letting go and you can't erase me

subtitles.original: Cause I'm the only one that could ever replace me
subtitles.english: Cause I'm the only one that could ever replace me

subtitles.original: Igniting every line until the time that I can face you
subtitles.english: Igniting every line until the time that I can face you

subtitles.original: I thought that it was love in the perfect lighting
subtitles.english: I thought that it was love in the perfect lighting

subtitles.original: It's never been enough but I'll keep on writing a story
subtitles.english: It's never been enough but I'll keep on writing a story

subtitles.original: That evolved me, it's the day that I'm deciding I'm alright
subtitles.english: That evolved me, it's the day that I'm deciding I'm alright

subtitles.original: So just how far can I go?
subtitles.english: So just how far can I go?

subtitles.original: I think I already know
subtitles.english: I think I already know

subtitles.original: That view that I want to see
subtitles.english: That view that I want to see

subtitles.original: I still could make it in time
subtitles.english: I still could make it in time

subtitles.original: みなさん、welcome to the next stage!
subtitles.english: Everyone, welcome to the next stage!

subtitles.original: ぱちぱち、thank you for the ぱちぱちぱち。
subtitles.english: Clap clap, thank you for the claps.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much! What did you guys think?
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! What did you guys think?

subtitles.original: And check it out, we got this... and now I'm being goofy, I'm sorry.
subtitles.english: And check it out, we got this... and now I'm being goofy, I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: ぱちぱちぱち... thank you so much! Oh, is Oda-san here?
subtitles.english: Clap clap clap... thank you so much! Oh, is Oda-san here?

subtitles.original: Sorry if there's like, again, just lag.
subtitles.english: Sorry if there's like, again, just lag.
